Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;black glass^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;黑色玻璃^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: Do you have a ^orange;blast furnace^reset; yet? If so, try to smelt obsidian and bring me the results. I will be ^green;most grateful^reset; for your assistance.
Texts.Chs: 我记得你有一个^orange;冶炼炉^reset;，对吧？如果你有的话，请试着熔炼黑曜石，然后把产物给我。我会给你^green;更好的回报^reset;。
